mt: Resumption of the session period
ref: Resumption of the session
src: Wiederaufnahme der Sitzungsperiode

mt: I declare the session period of the European Parliament, which was interrupted on Friday, 17 December, resumed, wish you once again all the best for the New Year, and hope that you had a pleasant holiday.
ref: I declare resumed the session of the European Parliament adjourned on Friday 17 December 1999, and I would like once again to wish you a happy new year in the hope that you enjoyed a pleasant festive period.
src: Ich erkläre die am Freitag, dem 17. Dezember unterbrochene Sitzungsperiode des Europäischen Parlaments für wiederaufgenommen, wünsche Ihnen nochmals alles Gute zum Jahreswechsel und hoffe, daß Sie schöne Ferien hatten.

mt: As you may have noticed, the much-feared "Millennium Bug" did not occur. However, citizens of some of our Member States have become victims of terrible natural disasters.
ref: Although, as you will have seen, the dreaded 'millennium bug' failed to materialise, still the people in a number of countries suffered a series of natural disasters that truly were dreadful.
src: Wie Sie feststellen konnten, ist der gefürchtete "Millenium-Bug " nicht eingetreten. Doch sind Bürger einiger unserer Mitgliedstaaten Opfer von schrecklichen Naturkatastrophen geworden.

mt: There is a desire in Parliament for a debate on this matter during this session period in the coming days.
ref: You have requested a debate on this subject in the course of the next few days, during this part-session.
src: Im Parlament besteht der Wunsch nach einer Aussprache im Verlauf dieser Sitzungsperiode in den nächsten Tagen.

mt: Today, I would like to ask you—this is also the wish of some colleagues—to commemorate all victims of the storms, especially in the various countries of the European Union, with a minute of silence.
ref: In the meantime, I should like to observe a minute' s silence, as a number of Members have requested, on behalf of all the victims concerned, particularly those of the terrible storms, in the various countries of the European Union.
src: Heute möchte ich Sie bitten - das ist auch der Wunsch einiger Kolleginnen und Kollegen -, allen Opfern der Stürme, insbesondere in den verschiedenen Ländern der Europäischen Union, in einer Schweigeminute zu gedenken.

mt: I ask you to rise for a minute of silence.
ref: Please rise, then, for this minute' s silence.
src: Ich bitte Sie, sich zu einer Schweigeminute zu erheben.

mt: (The Parliament rises for a minute of silence.)
ref: (The House rose and observed a minute' s silence)
src: (Das Parlament erhebt sich zu einer Schweigeminute.)

mt: Madam President, on a point of order.
ref: Madam President, on a point of order.
src: Frau Präsidentin, zur Geschäftsordnung.

mt: As you surely know from the press and television, there have been several bomb explosions in Sri Lanka with numerous fatalities.
ref: You will be aware from the press and television that there have been a number of bomb explosions and killings in Sri Lanka.
src: Wie Sie sicher aus der Presse und dem Fernsehen wissen, gab es in Sri Lanka mehrere Bombenexplosionen mit zahlreichen Toten.

mt: Among the victims of the recent attacks in Sri Lanka is Mr. Kumar Ponnambalam, who visited the European Parliament only a few months ago.
ref: One of the people assassinated very recently in Sri Lanka was Mr Kumar Ponnambalam, who had visited the European Parliament just a few months ago.
src: Zu den Attentatsopfern, die es in jüngster Zeit in Sri Lanka zu beklagen gab, zählt auch Herr Kumar Ponnambalam, der dem Europäischen Parlament erst vor wenigen Monaten einen Besuch abgestattet hatte.

mt: Would it be appropriate for you, Madam President, to convey in a letter to the President of Sri Lanka the Parliament's regret at the violent death of Mr. Ponnambalam and other citizens of Sri Lanka, and to urge her to do everything in her power to seek a peaceful solution to this very difficult situation?
ref: Would it be appropriate for you, Madam President, to write a letter to the Sri Lankan President expressing Parliament's regret at his and the other violent deaths in Sri Lanka and urging her to do everything she possibly can to seek a peaceful reconciliation to a very difficult situation?
src: Wäre es angemessen, wenn Sie, Frau Präsidentin, der Präsidentin von Sri Lanka in einem Schreiben das Bedauern des Parlaments zum gewaltsamen Tod von Herrn Ponnambalam und anderen Bürgern von Sri Lanka übermitteln und sie auffordern würden, alles in ihrem Kräften stehende zu tun, um nach einer friedlichen Lösung dieser sehr schwierigen Situation zu suchen?

mt: Yes, Mr. Evans, I think such an initiative is indeed appropriate.
ref: Yes, Mr Evans, I feel an initiative of the type you have just suggested would be entirely appropriate.
src: Ja, Herr Evans, ich denke, daß eine derartige Initiative durchaus angebracht ist.

mt: If the House agrees, I will follow Mr. Evans' suggestion.
ref: If the House agrees, I shall do as Mr Evans has suggested.
src: Wenn das Haus damit einverstanden ist, werde ich dem Vorschlag von Herrn Evans folgen.

mt: Madam President, on a point of order.
ref: Madam President, on a point of order.
src: Frau Präsidentin, zur Geschäftsordnung.

mt: Could you give me information regarding Article 143 in connection with inadmissibility?
ref: I would like your advice about Rule 143 concerning inadmissibility.
src: Könnten Sie mir eine Auskunft zu Artikel 143 im Zusammenhang mit der Unzulässigkeit geben?

mt: My question concerns a matter that will be raised on Thursday, and to which I will refer again then.
ref: My question relates to something that will come up on Thursday and which I will then raise again.
src: Meine Frage betrifft eine Angelegenheit, die am Donnerstag zur Sprache kommen wird und auf die ich dann erneut verweisen werde.

mt: On Thursday, Parliament will deal with the Cunha report on multiannual guidance programs, which in paragraph 6 proposes that countries that do not meet their fleet reduction targets should be subject to a kind of quota penalty each year.
ref: The Cunha report on multiannual guidance programmes comes before Parliament on Thursday and contains a proposal in paragraph 6 that a form of quota penalties should be introduced for countries which fail to meet their fleet reduction targets annually.
src: Das Parlament wird sich am Donnerstag mit dem Cunha-Bericht über mehrjährige Ausrichtungsprogramme befassen, der in Absatz 6 vorschlägt, daß Länder, die ihr Soll zur Flottenverkleinerung nicht erfüllen, jährlich mit einer Art Quotenstrafe belegt werden sollen.

mt: Such penalties are to be imposed despite the principle of relative stability.
ref: It says that this should be done despite the principle of relative stability.
src: Und zwar sollen derartige Strafen trotz des Grundsatzes der relativen Stabilität verhängt werden.

mt: I believe that the principle of relative stability is a fundamental legal principle of the common fisheries policy, and a proposal to circumvent it would be legally inadmissible.
ref: I believe that the principle of relative stability is a fundamental legal principle of the common fisheries policy and a proposal to subvert it would be legally inadmissible.
src: Ich meine, daß der Grundsatz der relativen Stabilität einen elementaren Rechtsgrundsatz der gemeinsamen Fischereipolitik darstellt und ein Vorschlag, diesen zu unterlaufen, rechtlich unzulässig wäre.

mt: I would like to know whether it is possible to raise an objection to a document that is merely a report and not a legislative proposal, and whether I am authorized to do so on Thursday.
ref: I want to know whether one can raise an objection of that kind to what is merely a report, not a legislative proposal, and whether that is something I can competently do on Thursday.
src: Ich möchte wissen, ob es möglich ist, einen Einwand gegen ein Dokument zu erheben, bei dem es sich lediglich um einen Bericht und keinen Legislativvorschlag handelt, und ob ich befugt bin, dies am Donnerstag zu tun.

mt: Exactly then, if you wish, you can raise this question, i.e., on Thursday at the beginning of the debate on the report.
ref: That is precisely the time when you may, if you wish, raise this question, i.e. on Thursday prior to the start of the presentation of the report.
src: Genau dann können Sie, wenn Sie wollen, diese Frage ansprechen, d. h. am Donnerstag zu Beginn der Aussprache über den Bericht.

mt: Unfortunately, the first session of the European Parliament this year coincides with the scheduled execution in the United States, in Texas, on Thursday this week, of a 34-year-old man named Hicks who has been sentenced to death.
ref: Madam President, coinciding with this year' s first part-session of the European Parliament, a date has been set, unfortunately for next Thursday, in Texas in America, for the execution of a young 34 year-old man who has been sentenced to death. We shall call him Mr Hicks.
src: Die erste diesjährige Tagung des Europäischen Parlaments fällt leider damit zusammen, daß in den Vereinigten Staaten, in Texas, für Donnerstag dieser Woche die Hinrichtung eines zum Tode verurteilten 34jährigen jungen Mannes namens Hicks festgelegt worden ist.

mt: At the request of a French member, Mr. Zimeray, a petition has already been submitted, which has been signed by many, including myself.
ref: At the request of a French Member, Mr Zimeray, a petition has already been presented, which many people signed, including myself.
src: Auf Wunsch eines französischen Mitglieds, Herrn Zimeray, wurde bereits eine Petition eingereicht, die von vielen, auch von mir selbst, unterzeichnet worden ist.

mt: In line with the position now consistently taken by the European Parliament and the entire European Union, I would like to ask you to use the full influence of your office and the institution you represent with the presidential candidate and Governor of Texas, George W. Bush, who has the authority to suspend the execution of the death sentence and to pardon the convicted man.
ref: However, I would ask you, in accordance with the line which is now constantly followed by the European Parliament and by the whole of the European Community, to make representations, using the weight of your prestigious office and the institution you represent, to the President and to the Governor of Texas, Mr Bush, who has the power to order a stay of execution and to reprieve the condemned person.
src: Gemäß der vom Europäischen Parlament und von der gesamten Europäischen Union nunmehr ständig vertretenen Linie möchte ich Sie jedoch bitten, den ganzen Einfluß Ihres Amtes und der Institution, die Sie vertreten, bei dem Präsidentschaftskandidaten und Gouverneur von Texas, George W. Bush, der zur Aussetzung der Vollstreckung des Todesurteils und zur Begnadigung des Verurteilten befugt ist, geltend zu machen.

mt: All this is in accordance with the principles we have always defended.
ref: This is all in accordance with the principles that we have always upheld.
src: All dies entspricht den Grundsätzen, die wir stets verteidigt haben.

mt: Thank you very much, Mr. Segni, I will gladly do so.
ref: Thank you, Mr Segni, I shall do so gladly.
src: Vielen Dank, Herr Segni, das will ich gerne tun.

mt: That is entirely in line with the position we as Parliament have always taken.
ref: Indeed, it is quite in keeping with the positions this House has always adopted.
src: Das ist ganz im Sinne der Position, die wir als Parlament immer vertreten haben.

mt: Madam President! I would like to draw your attention to a case with which this Parliament has repeatedly dealt.
ref: Madam President, I should like to draw your attention to a case in which this Parliament has consistently shown an interest.
src: Frau Präsidentin! Ich möchte Sie auf einen Fall aufmerksam machen, mit dem sich dieses Parlament immer wieder befaßt hat.

mt: This is the case of Alexander Nikitin.
ref: It is the case of Alexander Nikitin.
src: Das ist der Fall von Alexander Nikitin.

mt: We are all pleased here that the court acquitted him and made it clear that access to environmental information is a constitutional right even in Russia.
ref: All of us here are pleased that the courts have acquitted him and made it clear that in Russia, too, access to environmental information is a constitutional right.
src: Wir freuen uns hier alle, daß das Gericht ihn freigesprochen und deutlich gemacht hat, daß auch in Rußland der Zugang zu Umweltinformationen konstitutionelles Recht ist.

mt: However, it is now the case that he is to be charged again because the prosecutor is appealing.
ref: Now, however, he is to go before the courts once more because the public prosecutor is appealing.
src: Nun ist es aber so, daß er wieder angeklagt werden soll, weil der Staatsanwalt in Berufung geht.

mt: We know—and we have established this in very many resolutions, especially during the last plenary session of the past year—that this is not just a legal case and that it is wrong to accuse Alexander Nikitin of criminality and treason, because we, as those affected, benefit from his findings.
ref: We know, and we have stated as much in very many resolutions indeed, including specifically during the last plenary part-session of last year, that this is not solely a legal case and that it is wrong for Alexander Nikitin to be accused of criminal activity and treason because of our involvement as the beneficiaries of his findings.
src: Wir wissen und wir haben es in wirklich sehr vielen Entschließungen festgestellt - gerade während der letzten Plenartagung des vergangenen Jahres-, daß dies nicht nur ein juristischer Fall ist und daß es falsch ist, Alexander Nikitin Kriminalität und Verrat vorzuwerfen, weil wir als Betroffene von seinen Ergebnissen einen Nutzen haben.

mt: These findings are the basis for the European programs to protect the Barents Sea, and that is why I ask you to review a draft letter that outlines the key facts for you and to make this position clear in Russia in accordance with the Parliament's decisions.
ref: These findings form the basis of the European programmes to protect the Barents Sea, and that is why I would ask you to examine a draft letter setting out the most important facts and to make Parliament's position, as expressed in the resolutions which it has adopted, clear as far as Russia is concerned.
src: Diese Ergebnisse sind die Grundlage für die europäischen Programme zum Schutz der Barentsee, und deswegen bitte ich Sie, einen Briefentwurf, der Ihnen die wichtigsten Fakten schildert, zu prüfen und im Sinne der Beschlüsse des Parlaments in Rußland diese Position deutlich zu machen.

mt: Ms. Schroedter, I am happy to review the relevant facts when your letter is available to me.
ref: Yes, Mrs Schroedter, I shall be pleased to look into the facts of this case when I have received your letter.
src: Frau Schroedter, ich bin gerne bereit, die damit zusammenhängenden Fakten zu prüfen, wenn mir Ihr Brief vorliegt.

mt: Madam President, first of all, thank you very much for keeping your word and for the fact that now, in the first session period of the new year, the range of television programs in our offices has actually been greatly expanded.
ref: Madam President, I would firstly like to compliment you on the fact that you have kept your word and that, during this first part-session of the new year, the number of television channels in our offices has indeed increased considerably.
src: Frau Präsidentin, zunächst besten Dank dafür, daß Sie Wort gehalten haben und nun in der ersten Sitzungsperiode des neuen Jahres das Angebot an Fernsehprogrammen in unseren Büros tatsächlich enorm erweitert ist.

mt: Nevertheless, Madam President, my request has not been met.
ref: But, Madam President, my personal request has not been met.
src: Dennoch, Frau Präsidentin, wurde meinem Wunsch nicht entsprochen.

mt: Although we can now receive two Finnish and one Portuguese channel, we still cannot receive a Dutch channel. But I had asked you for a Dutch program, because we Dutch also want to follow the news when we are sent here into exile every month.
ref: Although there are now two Finnish channels and one Portuguese one, there is still no Dutch channel, which is what I had requested because Dutch people here like to be able to follow the news too when we are sent to this place of exile every month.
src: Zwar können wir jetzt zwei finnische und einen portugiesischen, nach wie vor aber keinen niederländischen Sender empfangen. Ich hatte Sie aber um ein niederländisches Programm gebeten, denn auch wir Niederländer möchten die Nachrichten verfolgen, wenn wir jeden Monat hierher in die Verbannung geschickt werden.

mt: Therefore, I would like to ask you again to ensure that a Dutch channel is also made available.
ref: I would therefore once more ask you to ensure that we get a Dutch channel as well.
src: Deshalb möchte ich Sie nochmals ersuchen, dafür Sorge zu tragen, daß auch ein niederländischer Sender eingespeist wird.

mt: Ms. Plooij-van Gorsel, I can inform you that this item is on the agenda of the Quaestors on Wednesday.
ref: Mrs Plooij-van Gorsel, I can tell you that this matter is on the agenda for the Quaestors' meeting on Wednesday.
src: Frau Plooij-van Gorsel, ich kann Ihnen mitteilen, daß dieser Punkt am Mittwoch auf der Tagesordnung der Quästoren steht.

mt: I hope that a decision will be made there in your favor.
ref: It will, I hope, be examined in a positive light.
src: Ich hoffe, daß dort in Ihrem Sinne entschieden wird.

mt: Madam President, can you tell me why this Parliament does not comply with the occupational safety regulations it has adopted itself?
ref: Madam President, can you tell me why this Parliament does not adhere to the health and safety legislation that it actually passes?
src: Frau Präsidentin, können Sie mir sagen, warum sich dieses Parlament nicht an die Arbeitsschutzregelungen hält, die es selbst verabschiedet hat?

mt: Why has the air quality in this building not been checked even once since our election?
ref: Why has no air quality test been done on this particular building since we were elected?
src: Weshalb wurde die Luftqualität in diesem Gebäude seit unserer Wahl nicht ein einziges Mal überprüft?

mt: Why has the occupational safety committee not met even once since 1998?
ref: Why has there been no Health and Safety Committee meeting since 1998?
src: Weshalb ist der Arbeitsschutzausschuß seit 1998 nicht ein einziges Mal zusammengetreten?

mt: Why has there been no fire drill in either the Brussels or Strasbourg Parliament building?
ref: Why has there been no fire drill, either in the Brussels Parliament buildings or the Strasbourg Parliament buildings?
src: Warum hat weder im Brüsseler noch im Straßburger Parlamentsgebäude eine Brandschutzübung stattgefunden?

mt: Why are there no fire safety instructions?
ref: Why are there no fire instructions?
src: Warum finden keine Brandschutzbelehrungen statt?

mt: Why was nothing done to make the stairs safer after my accident?
ref: Why have the staircases not been improved since my accident?
src: Warum wurde nach meinem Unfall nichts unternommen, um die Treppen sicherer zu machen?

mt: Why is the smoking ban not enforced in the non-smoking areas?
ref: Why are no-smoking areas not enforced?
src: Warum wird in den Nichtraucherzonen das Rauchverbot nicht durchgesetzt?

mt: It is a disgrace that we adopt rules and then do not comply with them ourselves.
ref: It seems absolutely disgraceful that we pass legislation and do not adhere to it ourselves.
src: Es ist eine Schande, daß wir Regeln verabschieden, an die wir uns dann selbst nicht halten.

mt: Ms. Lynne, you are absolutely right, and I will check whether all this is really the case.
ref: Mrs Lynne, you are quite right and I shall check whether this has actually not been done.
src: Frau Lynne, Sie haben völlig recht, und ich werde prüfen, ob all dies wirklich so ist.

mt: I will also submit the question to the Quaestors. I am sure that they attach great importance to ensuring that we ourselves comply with the legal provisions we adopt.
ref: I shall also refer the matter to the College of Quaestors, and I am certain that they will be keen to ensure that we comply with the regulations we ourselves vote on.
src: Ich werde die Frage auch den Quästoren unterbreiten. Ich bin mir sicher, daß diese großen Wert darauf legen, daß wir die Rechtsvorschriften, die wir verabschieden, auch selbst einhalten.

mt: Madam President! Ms. Díez González and I had submitted some questions regarding certain statements made by the Vice-President, Ms. de Palacio, as reported in a Spanish newspaper.
ref: Madam President, Mrs Díez González and I had tabled questions on certain opinions of the Vice-President, Mrs de Palacio, which appeared in a Spanish newspaper.
src: Frau Präsidentin! Frau Díez González und ich hatten einige Anfragen zu bestimmten, in einer spanischen Zeitung wiedergegebenen Stellungnahmen der Vizepräsidentin, Frau de Palacio, gestellt.

mt: The competent services did not include them on the agenda, as they believed they had already been answered in a previous session.
ref: The competent services have not included them in the agenda on the grounds that they had been answered in a previous part-session.
src: Die zuständigen Dienste haben sie nicht in die Tagesordnung aufgenommen, da sie der Meinung waren, sie seien schon in einer vorangegangenen Sitzung beantwortet worden.

mt: I ask that this decision be reconsidered, because that is not the case.
ref: I would ask that they reconsider, since this is not the case.
src: Ich bitte, diese Entscheidung zu überdenken, weil das nicht der Fall ist.

mt: The previously answered questions referred to Ms. de Palacio's conduct in a specific matter, not to the statements published in the daily newspaper ABC on 18 November last year.
ref: The questions answered previously referred to Mrs de Palacio' s intervention, on another occasion, and not to these comments which appeared in the ABC newspaper on 18 November.
src: Die früher beantworteten Anfragen bezogen sich auf das Auftreten von Frau de Palacio in einer bestimmten Angelegenheit, nicht auf die am 18. November des vergangenen Jahres in der Tageszeitung ABC erschienenen Erklärungen.

mt: Dear colleague, we will look into this.
ref: Mr Berenguer Fuster, we shall check all this.
src: Lieber Kollege, wir werden das prüfen.

mt: However, I must tell you that I currently find the situation somewhat confusing.
ref: I admit that, at present, the matter seems to be somewhat confused.
src: Ich muß Ihnen aber sagen, daß ich die Lage im Moment für etwas verworren halte.

mt: But we will examine it very carefully to ensure that everything is in order.
ref: We shall therefore look into it properly to ensure that everything is as it should be.
src: Wir werden das aber sehr genau prüfen, damit alles seine Richtigkeit hat.

mt: Madam President, I would like to know whether Parliament will this week send a clear signal of our dissatisfaction regarding today's decision to reject an extension of the arms embargo against Indonesia, especially since the vast majority in this Parliament has in the past spoken out in favor of the arms embargo against Indonesia.
ref: Madam President, I should like to know if there will be a clear message going out from Parliament this week about our discontent over today's decision refusing to renew the arms embargo on Indonesia, considering that the vast majority in this Parliament have endorsed the arms embargo in Indonesia in the past?
src: Frau Präsidentin, ich wüßte gern, ob das Parlament in dieser Woche ein deutliches Signal unserer Unzufriedenheit bezüglich der heutigen Entscheidung, mit der eine Verlängerung des Waffenembargos gegen Indonesien abgelehnt wird, aussenden wird, zumal sich die große Mehrheit in diesem Parlament in der Vergangenheit für das Waffenembargo gegen Indonesien ausgesprochen hat.

mt: Today's decision against extending the embargo poses a very great danger in view of the situation there.
ref: Today's decision not to renew the embargo is extremely dangerous considering the situation there.
src: Die heutige Entscheidung gegen eine Verlängerung des Embargos birgt angesichts der dortigen Lage eine sehr große Gefahr.

mt: Parliament should, since this is the wish of the vast majority, send an appropriate message.
ref: So Parliament should send a message, since that is the wish of the vast majority.
src: Das Parlament sollte, da dies dem Wunsch der großen Mehrheit entspricht, eine entsprechende Botschaft senden.

mt: The rejection of an extension of the embargo by the EU Member States is irresponsible.
ref: It is irresponsible of EU Member States to refuse to renew the embargo.
src: Die Ablehnung einer Verlängerung des Embargos seitens der EU-Mitgliedstaaten ist unverantwortlich.

mt: As has already been established, the situation in Indonesia is extremely unstable.
ref: As people have said, the situation there is extremely volatile.
src: Wie bereits festgestellt wurde, ist die Lage in Indonesien äußerst instabil.

mt: There is even the danger of a military coup.
ref: There is, in fact, a risk of a military coup in the future.
src: Es besteht sogar die Gefahr eines Militärputsches.

mt: We do not know what will happen.
ref: We do not know what is happening.
src: Wir wissen nicht, was passiert.

mt: So why should arms manufacturers in the EU make profits at the expense of innocent people?
ref: So why should EU arms producers profit at the expense of innocent people?
src: Weshalb also sollten Waffenhersteller in der EU auf Kosten unschuldiger Menschen Profite einstreichen?

mt: This item is not currently scheduled for the urgent debate on Thursday.
ref: In any event, this question is not presently included among the requests for topical and urgent debate on Thursday.
src: Dieser Punkt ist bisher nicht für die Dringlichkeitsdebatte am Donnerstag vorgesehen.

mt: Order of business
ref: Agenda
src: Arbeitsplan

mt: According to the agenda, the next item is the consideration of the final draft agenda, as established by the Conference of Presidents on Thursday, 13 January, in accordance with Rule 110 of the Rules of Procedure.
ref: The next item is the verification of the final version of the draft agenda as drawn up by the Conference of Presidents at its meeting of 13 January pursuant to Rule 110 of the Rules of Procedure.
src: Nach der Tagesordnung folgt die Prüfung des endgültigen Entwurfs der Tagesordnung, wie er nach Artikel 110 der Geschäftsordnung am Donnerstag, dem 13. Januar von der Konferenz der Präsidenten festgelegt wurde.

mt: There are no changes for Monday and Tuesday.
ref: No amendments have been proposed relating to Monday and Tuesday.
src: Zu Montag und Dienstag liegen keine Änderungen vor.

mt: For Wednesday:
ref: Relating to Wednesday:
src: Zum Mittwoch:

mt: The Socialist Group requests that a statement by the Commission on its strategic objectives for the next five years as well as on the administrative reform of the Commission be included on the agenda.
ref: The Group of the Party of European Socialists requests that a Commission statement be included on its strategic objectives for the next five years and on the administrative reform of the Commission.
src: Die Sozialdemokratische Fraktion beantragt, eine Erklärung der Kommission über ihre strategischen Ziele für die nächsten fünf Jahre sowie über die Verwaltungsreform der Kommission in die Tagesordnung aufzunehmen.

mt: I ask the applicant, Mr. Barón Crespo, to justify his request, if he so wishes.
ref: I would like Mr Barón Crespo, who made the request, to speak to propose it. That is, if he so wishes, of course.
src: Ich bitte den Antragsteller, Herrn Barón Crespo, seinen Antrag zu begründen, falls er dies wünscht.

mt: After that, we will proceed as usual: one speaker in favor, one against.
ref: Then we shall follow the usual procedure, hearing one speaker in favour and one against.
src: Danach verfahren wir wie üblich: ein Redner dafür, einer dagegen.

mt: Madam President! The presentation of the Prodi Commission's political program for the entire legislative period was based on a proposal by the Group of the Party of European Socialists, which received the unanimous approval of the Conference of Presidents in September and also the explicit consent of President Prodi, who reaffirmed his commitment in his inaugural speech.
ref: Madam President, the presentation of the Prodi Commission' s political programme for the whole legislature was initially a proposal by the Group of the Party of European Socialists which was unanimously approved by the Conference of Presidents in September and which was also explicitly accepted by President Prodi, who reiterated his commitment in his inaugural speech.
src: Frau Präsidentin! Die Vorstellung des politischen Programms der Kommission Prodi für die gesamte Wahlperiode ging auf einen Vorschlag der Fraktion der Sozialdemokratischen Partei Europas zurück, der die einhellige Billigung der Konferenz der Präsidenten im September und auch die ausdrückliche Zustimmung von Präsident Prodi fand, der seine Zusage in seiner Antrittsrede bekräftigte.

mt: This commitment is significant in that the Commission is a body which, according to the Treaties, has the monopoly of initiative and thus fundamentally shapes the political and legislative activity of this Parliament over the next five years.
ref: This commitment is important because the Commission is a body with a monopoly of initiative in accordance with the Treaties and, therefore, basically dictates this Parliament' s political and legislative activity for the next five years.
src: Diese Zusage ist insofern von Bedeutung, als die Kommission ein Organ ist, das nach den Verträgen das Initiativmonopol besitzt und somit grundlegend die politische und legislative Tätigkeit dieses Parlaments in den nächsten fünf Jahren gestaltet.

mt: I would also like to remind you that this Parliament, in the previous legislative period, expressed its confidence in President Prodi twice; in this legislative period, it again expressed its confidence in him in July, and then, when the new Commission was in office, there was again a vote of confidence for the Commission as a whole in September.
ref: I would also like to point out, Madam President, that this Parliament voted to express its confidence in President Prodi during the previous legislature. It did so again during this legislature, in July, and then, in September, it voted once more to approve the whole Commission.
src: Ich möchte auch daran erinnern, daß dieses Parlament in der vorangegangenen Wahlperiode Präsident Prodi zweimal sein Vertrauen ausgesprochen hat; in dieser Wahlperiode sprach es ihm im Juli erneut sein Vertrauen aus, und dann, als die neue Kommission im Amt war, gab es im September erneut ein Vertrauensvotum für die Kommission insgesamt.

mt: Thus, the Commission has already had sufficient time to draw up its program, and we have had time to get to know it and to explain it to the citizens.
ref: There has therefore been enough time for the Commission to prepare its programme and for us to become familiar with it and explain it to our citizens.
src: Somit hatte die Kommission bereits genügend Zeit, ihr Programm zu erarbeiten, und wir, um es kennenlernen und den Bürgern erklären zu können.

mt: In this sense, I recall the resolution of 15 September, which recommended that the proposal be presented as soon as possible.
ref: To this end, I would like to remind you of the resolution of 15 September, which recommended that the proposal be presented as soon as possible.
src: In diesem Sinne erinnere ich an die Entschließung vom 15. September, in der empfohlen wurde, den Vorschlag in der kürzestmöglichen Frist vorzulegen.

mt: The events of the past week—which began on the sidelines of the Conference of Presidents and in which this Conference was used only to confirm and ratify decisions taken elsewhere—highlight a dilemma: Either the Commission is unable to present this program (in which case it should clarify the situation.
ref: The events of last week - which originated outside the Conference of Presidents, that Conference being used simply to corroborate and ratify decisions taken elsewhere - present us with a dilemma. Either the Commission is not ready to present this programme, in which case it should clarify it.
src: Die Ereignisse der vergangenen Woche - die am Rande der Konferenz der Präsidenten ihren Anfang nahmen und wobei diese Konferenz nur zur Bestätigung und Ratifizierung von außerhalb gefaßten Beschlüssen genutzt wurde - verdeutlichen ein Dilemma: Entweder ist die Kommission nicht in der Lage, dieses Programm vorzulegen (In diesem Fall sollte sie eine Klärung herbeiführen.

mt: According to the words of its President, it is able to do so.
ref: According to its President, it is in a position to do so.
src: Nach den Worten ihres Präsidenten ist sie dazu in der Lage.

mt: Since the Commission is represented by Vice-President Ms. de Palacio, I consider it appropriate, before the vote, to learn the Commission's position regarding its readiness to present the program as agreed.), or Parliament is unable to consider this program, as some apparently claim.
ref: Given that the Commission is represented by Vice-President de Palacio, I believe that, before voting, it would help if the Commission could let us know how ready it is to present this programme, as agreed. Alternatively, Parliament is not ready to examine this programme, as some appear to be suggesting.
src: Da die Kommission durch die Vizepräsidentin, Frau de Palacio, vertreten ist, halte ich es für zweckmäßig, vor der Abstimmung die Position der Kommission hinsichtlich ihrer Bereitschaft zur Vorstellung des Programms, so wie es vereinbart war, zu erfahren.), oder das Parlament ist zur Prüfung dieses Programms nicht in der Lage, wie einige offenbar vorgeben.

mt: In my view, this second hypothesis would amount to a renunciation of our responsibility as Parliament and, moreover, to the introduction of an original thesis, an unknown method, which would consist in providing the groups with the Commission's programmatic speech in written form a week in advance—and not, as agreed, the day before—bearing in mind that the legislative program will be discussed in February, so that we could dispense with the debate, since the press and the Internet would have informed all citizens about it the next day and Parliament would have no reason to deal with the matter.
ref: In my opinion, this second hypothesis would imply the failure of Parliament in its duty as a Parliament, as well as introducing an original thesis, an unknown method which consists of making political groups aware, in writing, of a speech concerning the Commission' s programme a week earlier - and not a day earlier, as had been agreed - bearing in mind that the legislative programme will be discussed in February, so we could forego the debate, since on the next day our citizens will hear about it in the press and on the Internet and Parliament will no longer have to worry about it.
src: Nach meiner Ansicht würde diese zweite Hypothese einem Verzicht auf unsere Verantwortung als Parlament und darüber hinaus dem Aufwerfen einer originellen These, einer unbekannten Methode gleichkommen, die darin bestände, den Fraktionen die programmatische Rede der Kommission in schriftlicher Form eine Woche vorher - und nicht, wie vereinbart, am Tag zuvor - zur Kenntnis zu geben, wobei zu berücksichtigen ist, daß das Legislativprogramm im Februar diskutiert werden wird, so daß wir auf die Aussprache verzichten könnten, da die Presse und das Internet am Tag darauf alle Bürger darüber informiert haben würden und das Parlament keinen Grund mehr hätte, sich mit der Angelegenheit zu befassen.

mt: Since my group believes that a Parliament is there to listen, to discuss, and to reflect, in our view there is no justification for this delay, and we believe that if the Commission is able to do so, we are exactly on time to reinstate the original agreement between Parliament and the Commission and to be able to appear responsibly before our fellow citizens.
ref: My Group believes that since a parliament is meant to listen, debate and reflect, there can be no justification whatsoever for this delay and we believe that, if the Commission is ready to do so, we still have time to re-establish the original agreement between Parliament and the Commission and proceed in a manner which fulfils our duty to our fellow citizens.
src: Da meine Fraktion der Meinung ist, daß ein Parlament dazu da ist, zuzuhören, zu diskutieren und nachzudenken, gibt es unserer Ansicht nach keinen Grund zur Rechtfertigung dieser Verzögerung, und wir glauben, wenn die Kommission dazu in der Lage ist, liegen wir genau in der Zeit, um die ursprüngliche Vereinbarung zwischen dem Parlament und der Kommission wieder in Kraft zu setzen und verantwortungsbewußt vor unsere Mitbürgerinnen und Mitbürgern treten zu können.

mt: Therefore, the proposal of the Group of the Party of European Socialists, which you mentioned, is to keep Wednesday as the date for the presentation of the Prodi Commission's program for the legislative period, and to include in this program the administrative reform project, since otherwise we could find ourselves in a paradoxical situation: with the excuse that the text is not available, the President of the Commission would be denied the right to speak in this Parliament, and on the other hand, a debate on the reform would take place without this Parliament having previously read the texts on which the debate is based.
ref: Therefore, the proposal of the Group of the Party of European Socialists, and which you have mentioned, is that the Prodi Commission present its legislative programme on Wednesday, including its proposed administrative reform, because, otherwise, we could find ourselves in a paradoxical situation: on the pretext that there is no text, on the one hand, the President of the Commission would be denied his right to speak in this Parliament and, on the other hand, there would be a debate on a reform when Parliament had no prior knowledge of the texts on which it is based.
src: Deshalb besteht der Vorschlag der Fraktion der Sozialdemokratischen Partei Europas, den Sie erwähnt haben, darin, den Mittwoch als Termin der Vorstellung des Programms der Kommission Prodi für die Wahlperiode beizubehalten, und in dieses Programm auch das Verwaltungsreformprojekt einzubeziehen, da wir andernfalls in eine paradoxe Situation geraten könnten: Mit der Ausrede, der Wortlaut liege nicht vor, wird einerseits dem Präsidenten der Kommission das Recht abgesprochen, in diesem Parlament zu sprechen, und andererseits würde eine Aussprache über die Reform stattfinden, ohne daß dieses Parlament zuvor die Texte lesen konnte, die der Aussprache zugrunde liegen.

mt: Therefore, I ask you, Madam President, to request the Commission to state its position now, and then to proceed to the vote.
ref: Therefore, Madam President, I would ask you to request that the Commission express its opinion on this issue and that we then proceed to the vote.
src: Daher bitte ich Sie, Frau Präsidentin, die Kommission zu ersuchen, sich jetzt zu äußern, und danach zur Abstimmung zu schreiten.

mt: (Applause from the PSE Group)
ref: (Applause from the PSE Group)
src: (Beifall der PSE-Fraktion)

mt: Madam President, dear colleagues! I am somewhat surprised by the behavior of Mr. Barón Crespo, who now demands that this item be placed on the agenda for Wednesday.
ref: Madam President, I really am quite astonished at Mr Barón Crespo' s behaviour and the fact that he is now asking for this item to be put on Wednesday's agenda.
src: Frau Präsidentin, liebe Kolleginnen und Kollegen! Ich bin doch etwas erstaunt über das Verhalten des Kollegen Barón Crespo, der jetzt verlangt, daß dieser Tagesordnungspunkt auf die Tagesordnung für Mittwoch gesetzt wird.

mt: Mr. Barón Crespo, you were unable to attend the Conference of Presidents last Thursday.
ref: Mr Barón Crespo, you were unable to attend the Conference of Presidents last Thursday.
src: Herr Kollege Barón Crespo, Sie konnten am letzten Donnerstag in der Konferenz der Präsidenten nicht anwesend sein.

mt: I do not criticize that; it happens from time to time that one is represented by someone else.
ref: I am not criticising this; it happens from time to time that people send someone to represent them.
src: Das kritisiere ich nicht; es kommt immer mal vor, daß man sich vertreten läßt.

mt: Mr. Hänsch represented you there.
ref: Mr Hänsch represented you on this occasion.
src: Der Kollege Hänsch hat Sie dort vertreten.

mt: We had a detailed debate in the Conference of Presidents.
ref: In the Conference of Presidents, we had an in-depth discussion.
src: Wir haben in der Konferenz der Präsidenten eine ausführliche Debatte geführt.

mt: Only your group supported what you are now saying.
ref: Your Group was alone in advocating what you are saying now.
src: Nur Ihre Fraktion hat das vertreten, was Sie jetzt sagen.

mt: We then voted.
ref: We then put it to a vote.
src: Wir haben dann abgestimmt.

mt: Each chairperson has as many votes as the group has members.
ref: As you know, each chairman has the same number of votes as his Group has Members.
src: Jeder Vorsitzende bzw. jede Vorsitzende hat ja so viele Stimmen, wie die Fraktion Mitglieder hat.

mt: There was a vote on this item.
ref: There was a vote on this matter.
src: Es gab eine Abstimmung zu diesem Punkt.

mt: To the best of my recollection, the vote was: 422 to 180 with a few abstentions.
ref: As I recall, the outcome of this vote was 422 votes to 180 with a few abstentions.
src: Diese Abstimmung ist meiner Erinnerung nach so ausgegangen: 422 gegen 180 Stimmen bei einigen wenigen Enthaltungen.

mt: That means all groups, except the non-attached members—but they are not a group—were in agreement; only your group was of the opinion to proceed as you have proposed here.
ref: This means that all the Groups with the exception of the non-attached Members - but, of course, they are not a Group - were in agreement; only your Group thought that we should proceed as you have proposed here.
src: Das heißt, alle Fraktionen, mit Ausnahme der Fraktionslosen - aber die sind ja keine Fraktion - waren sich einig, nur Ihre Fraktion war der Meinung, so zu verfahren, wie Sie es hier vorgeschlagen haben.

mt: All others were of a different opinion.
ref: All of the others were of a different opinion.
src: Alle anderen waren anderer Meinung.

mt: That was the decision.
ref: That was the decision.
src: Das war der Beschluß.

mt: Now I would like to say something about the matter itself.
ref: I should now like to comment on the issue itself.
src: Jetzt möchte ich zur Sache selbst etwas sagen.

mt: Resumption of the session period
ref: Resumption of the session
src: Wiederaufnahme der Sitzungsperiode

mt: I declare the session period of the European Parliament, which was interrupted on Friday, 17 December, resumed, wish you once again all the best for the New Year, and hope that you had a pleasant holiday.
ref: I declare resumed the session of the European Parliament adjourned on Friday 17 December 1999, and I would like once again to wish you a happy new year in the hope that you enjoyed a pleasant festive period.
src: Ich erkläre die am Freitag, dem 17. Dezember unterbrochene Sitzungsperiode des Europäischen Parlaments für wiederaufgenommen, wünsche Ihnen nochmals alles Gute zum Jahreswechsel und hoffe, daß Sie schöne Ferien hatten.

mt: As you may have noticed, the much-feared "Millennium Bug" did not occur. However, citizens of some of our Member States have become victims of terrible natural disasters.
ref: Although, as you will have seen, the dreaded 'millennium bug' failed to materialise, still the people in a number of countries suffered a series of natural disasters that truly were dreadful.
src: Wie Sie feststellen konnten, ist der gefürchtete "Millenium-Bug " nicht eingetreten. Doch sind Bürger einiger unserer Mitgliedstaaten Opfer von schrecklichen Naturkatastrophen geworden.

mt: There is a desire in Parliament for a debate on this matter during this session period in the coming days.
ref: You have requested a debate on this subject in the course of the next few days, during this part-session.
src: Im Parlament besteht der Wunsch nach einer Aussprache im Verlauf dieser Sitzungsperiode in den nächsten Tagen.

mt: Today, I would like to ask you—this is also the wish of some colleagues—to commemorate all victims of the storms, especially in the various countries of the European Union, with a minute of silence.
ref: In the meantime, I should like to observe a minute' s silence, as a number of Members have requested, on behalf of all the victims concerned, particularly those of the terrible storms, in the various countries of the European Union.
src: Heute möchte ich Sie bitten - das ist auch der Wunsch einiger Kolleginnen und Kollegen -, allen Opfern der Stürme, insbesondere in den verschiedenen Ländern der Europäischen Union, in einer Schweigeminute zu gedenken.

mt: I ask you to rise for a minute of silence.
ref: Please rise, then, for this minute' s silence.
src: Ich bitte Sie, sich zu einer Schweigeminute zu erheben.

mt: (The Parliament rises for a minute of silence.)
ref: (The House rose and observed a minute' s silence)
src: (Das Parlament erhebt sich zu einer Schweigeminute.)

mt: Madam President, on a point of order.
ref: Madam President, on a point of order.
src: Frau Präsidentin, zur Geschäftsordnung.

mt: As you surely know from the press and television, there have been several bomb explosions in Sri Lanka with numerous fatalities.
ref: You will be aware from the press and television that there have been a number of bomb explosions and killings in Sri Lanka.
src: Wie Sie sicher aus der Presse und dem Fernsehen wissen, gab es in Sri Lanka mehrere Bombenexplosionen mit zahlreichen Toten.

mt: Among the victims of the recent attacks in Sri Lanka is Mr. Kumar Ponnambalam, who visited the European Parliament only a few months ago.
ref: One of the people assassinated very recently in Sri Lanka was Mr Kumar Ponnambalam, who had visited the European Parliament just a few months ago.
src: Zu den Attentatsopfern, die es in jüngster Zeit in Sri Lanka zu beklagen gab, zählt auch Herr Kumar Ponnambalam, der dem Europäischen Parlament erst vor wenigen Monaten einen Besuch abgestattet hatte.

mt: Would it be appropriate for you, Madam President, to convey in a letter to the President of Sri Lanka the Parliament's regret at the violent death of Mr. Ponnambalam and other citizens of Sri Lanka, and to urge her to do everything in her power to seek a peaceful solution to this very difficult situation?
ref: Would it be appropriate for you, Madam President, to write a letter to the Sri Lankan President expressing Parliament's regret at his and the other violent deaths in Sri Lanka and urging her to do everything she possibly can to seek a peaceful reconciliation to a very difficult situation?
src: Wäre es angemessen, wenn Sie, Frau Präsidentin, der Präsidentin von Sri Lanka in einem Schreiben das Bedauern des Parlaments zum gewaltsamen Tod von Herrn Ponnambalam und anderen Bürgern von Sri Lanka übermitteln und sie auffordern würden, alles in ihrem Kräften stehende zu tun, um nach einer friedlichen Lösung dieser sehr schwierigen Situation zu suchen?

mt: Yes, Mr. Evans, I think such an initiative is indeed appropriate.
ref: Yes, Mr Evans, I feel an initiative of the type you have just suggested would be entirely appropriate.
src: Ja, Herr Evans, ich denke, daß eine derartige Initiative durchaus angebracht ist.

mt: If the House agrees, I will follow Mr. Evans' suggestion.
ref: If the House agrees, I shall do as Mr Evans has suggested.
src: Wenn das Haus damit einverstanden ist, werde ich dem Vorschlag von Herrn Evans folgen.

mt: Madam President, on a point of order.
ref: Madam President, on a point of order.
src: Frau Präsidentin, zur Geschäftsordnung.

mt: Could you give me information regarding Article 143 in connection with inadmissibility?
ref: I would like your advice about Rule 143 concerning inadmissibility.
src: Könnten Sie mir eine Auskunft zu Artikel 143 im Zusammenhang mit der Unzulässigkeit geben?

mt: My question concerns a matter that will be raised on Thursday, and to which I will refer again then.
ref: My question relates to something that will come up on Thursday and which I will then raise again.
src: Meine Frage betrifft eine Angelegenheit, die am Donnerstag zur Sprache kommen wird und auf die ich dann erneut verweisen werde.

mt: On Thursday, Parliament will deal with the Cunha report on multiannual guidance programs, which in paragraph 6 proposes that countries that do not meet their fleet reduction targets should be subject to a kind of quota penalty each year.
ref: The Cunha report on multiannual guidance programmes comes before Parliament on Thursday and contains a proposal in paragraph 6 that a form of quota penalties should be introduced for countries which fail to meet their fleet reduction targets annually.
src: Das Parlament wird sich am Donnerstag mit dem Cunha-Bericht über mehrjährige Ausrichtungsprogramme befassen, der in Absatz 6 vorschlägt, daß Länder, die ihr Soll zur Flottenverkleinerung nicht erfüllen, jährlich mit einer Art Quotenstrafe belegt werden sollen.

mt: Such penalties are to be imposed despite the principle of relative stability.
ref: It says that this should be done despite the principle of relative stability.
src: Und zwar sollen derartige Strafen trotz des Grundsatzes der relativen Stabilität verhängt werden.

mt: I believe that the principle of relative stability is a fundamental legal principle of the common fisheries policy, and a proposal to circumvent it would be legally inadmissible.
ref: I believe that the principle of relative stability is a fundamental legal principle of the common fisheries policy and a proposal to subvert it would be legally inadmissible.
src: Ich meine, daß der Grundsatz der relativen Stabilität einen elementaren Rechtsgrundsatz der gemeinsamen Fischereipolitik darstellt und ein Vorschlag, diesen zu unterlaufen, rechtlich unzulässig wäre.

mt: I would like to know whether it is possible to raise an objection to a document that is merely a report and not a legislative proposal, and whether I am authorized to do so on Thursday.
ref: I want to know whether one can raise an objection of that kind to what is merely a report, not a legislative proposal, and whether that is something I can competently do on Thursday.
src: Ich möchte wissen, ob es möglich ist, einen Einwand gegen ein Dokument zu erheben, bei dem es sich lediglich um einen Bericht und keinen Legislativvorschlag handelt, und ob ich befugt bin, dies am Donnerstag zu tun.

mt: Exactly then, if you wish, you can raise this question, i.e., on Thursday at the beginning of the debate on the report.
ref: That is precisely the time when you may, if you wish, raise this question, i.e. on Thursday prior to the start of the presentation of the report.
src: Genau dann können Sie, wenn Sie wollen, diese Frage ansprechen, d. h. am Donnerstag zu Beginn der Aussprache über den Bericht.

mt: Unfortunately, the first session of the European Parliament this year coincides with the scheduled execution in the United States, in Texas, on Thursday this week, of a 34-year-old man named Hicks who has been sentenced to death.
ref: Madam President, coinciding with this year' s first part-session of the European Parliament, a date has been set, unfortunately for next Thursday, in Texas in America, for the execution of a young 34 year-old man who has been sentenced to death. We shall call him Mr Hicks.
src: Die erste diesjährige Tagung des Europäischen Parlaments fällt leider damit zusammen, daß in den Vereinigten Staaten, in Texas, für Donnerstag dieser Woche die Hinrichtung eines zum Tode verurteilten 34jährigen jungen Mannes namens Hicks festgelegt worden ist.

mt: At the request of a French member, Mr. Zimeray, a petition has already been submitted, which has been signed by many, including myself.
ref: At the request of a French Member, Mr Zimeray, a petition has already been presented, which many people signed, including myself.
src: Auf Wunsch eines französischen Mitglieds, Herrn Zimeray, wurde bereits eine Petition eingereicht, die von vielen, auch von mir selbst, unterzeichnet worden ist.

mt: In line with the position now consistently taken by the European Parliament and the entire European Union, I would like to ask you to use the full influence of your office and the institution you represent with the presidential candidate and Governor of Texas, George W. Bush, who has the authority to suspend the execution of the death sentence and to pardon the convicted man.
ref: However, I would ask you, in accordance with the line which is now constantly followed by the European Parliament and by the whole of the European Community, to make representations, using the weight of your prestigious office and the institution you represent, to the President and to the Governor of Texas, Mr Bush, who has the power to order a stay of execution and to reprieve the condemned person.
src: Gemäß der vom Europäischen Parlament und von der gesamten Europäischen Union nunmehr ständig vertretenen Linie möchte ich Sie jedoch bitten, den ganzen Einfluß Ihres Amtes und der Institution, die Sie vertreten, bei dem Präsidentschaftskandidaten und Gouverneur von Texas, George W. Bush, der zur Aussetzung der Vollstreckung des Todesurteils und zur Begnadigung des Verurteilten befugt ist, geltend zu machen.

mt: All this is in accordance with the principles we have always defended.
ref: This is all in accordance with the principles that we have always upheld.
src: All dies entspricht den Grundsätzen, die wir stets verteidigt haben.

mt: Thank you very much, Mr. Segni, I will gladly do so.
ref: Thank you, Mr Segni, I shall do so gladly.
src: Vielen Dank, Herr Segni, das will ich gerne tun.

mt: That is entirely in line with the position we as Parliament have always taken.
ref: Indeed, it is quite in keeping with the positions this House has always adopted.
src: Das ist ganz im Sinne der Position, die wir als Parlament immer vertreten haben.

mt: Madam President! I would like to draw your attention to a case with which this Parliament has repeatedly dealt.
ref: Madam President, I should like to draw your attention to a case in which this Parliament has consistently shown an interest.
src: Frau Präsidentin! Ich möchte Sie auf einen Fall aufmerksam machen, mit dem sich dieses Parlament immer wieder befaßt hat.

mt: This is the case of Alexander Nikitin.
ref: It is the case of Alexander Nikitin.
src: Das ist der Fall von Alexander Nikitin.

mt: We are all pleased here that the court acquitted him and made it clear that access to environmental information is a constitutional right even in Russia.
ref: All of us here are pleased that the courts have acquitted him and made it clear that in Russia, too, access to environmental information is a constitutional right.
src: Wir freuen uns hier alle, daß das Gericht ihn freigesprochen und deutlich gemacht hat, daß auch in Rußland der Zugang zu Umweltinformationen konstitutionelles Recht ist.

mt: However, it is now the case that he is to be charged again because the prosecutor is appealing.
ref: Now, however, he is to go before the courts once more because the public prosecutor is appealing.
src: Nun ist es aber so, daß er wieder angeklagt werden soll, weil der Staatsanwalt in Berufung geht.

mt: We know—and we have established this in very many resolutions, especially during the last plenary session of the past year—that this is not just a legal case and that it is wrong to accuse Alexander Nikitin of criminality and treason, because we, as those affected, benefit from his findings.
ref: We know, and we have stated as much in very many resolutions indeed, including specifically during the last plenary part-session of last year, that this is not solely a legal case and that it is wrong for Alexander Nikitin to be accused of criminal activity and treason because of our involvement as the beneficiaries of his findings.
src: Wir wissen und wir haben es in wirklich sehr vielen Entschließungen festgestellt - gerade während der letzten Plenartagung des vergangenen Jahres-, daß dies nicht nur ein juristischer Fall ist und daß es falsch ist, Alexander Nikitin Kriminalität und Verrat vorzuwerfen, weil wir als Betroffene von seinen Ergebnissen einen Nutzen haben.

mt: These findings are the basis for the European programs to protect the Barents Sea, and that is why I ask you to review a draft letter that outlines the key facts for you and to make this position clear in Russia in accordance with the Parliament's decisions.
ref: These findings form the basis of the European programmes to protect the Barents Sea, and that is why I would ask you to examine a draft letter setting out the most important facts and to make Parliament's position, as expressed in the resolutions which it has adopted, clear as far as Russia is concerned.
src: Diese Ergebnisse sind die Grundlage für die europäischen Programme zum Schutz der Barentsee, und deswegen bitte ich Sie, einen Briefentwurf, der Ihnen die wichtigsten Fakten schildert, zu prüfen und im Sinne der Beschlüsse des Parlaments in Rußland diese Position deutlich zu machen.

mt: Ms. Schroedter, I am happy to review the relevant facts when your letter is available to me.
ref: Yes, Mrs Schroedter, I shall be pleased to look into the facts of this case when I have received your letter.
src: Frau Schroedter, ich bin gerne bereit, die damit zusammenhängenden Fakten zu prüfen, wenn mir Ihr Brief vorliegt.

mt: Madam President, first of all, thank you very much for keeping your word and for the fact that now, in the first session period of the new year, the range of television programs in our offices has actually been greatly expanded.
ref: Madam President, I would firstly like to compliment you on the fact that you have kept your word and that, during this first part-session of the new year, the number of television channels in our offices has indeed increased considerably.
src: Frau Präsidentin, zunächst besten Dank dafür, daß Sie Wort gehalten haben und nun in der ersten Sitzungsperiode des neuen Jahres das Angebot an Fernsehprogrammen in unseren Büros tatsächlich enorm erweitert ist.

mt: Nevertheless, Madam President, my request has not been met.
ref: But, Madam President, my personal request has not been met.
src: Dennoch, Frau Präsidentin, wurde meinem Wunsch nicht entsprochen.

mt: Although we can now receive two Finnish and one Portuguese channel, we still cannot receive a Dutch channel. But I had asked you for a Dutch program, because we Dutch also want to follow the news when we are sent here into exile every month.
ref: Although there are now two Finnish channels and one Portuguese one, there is still no Dutch channel, which is what I had requested because Dutch people here like to be able to follow the news too when we are sent to this place of exile every month.
src: Zwar können wir jetzt zwei finnische und einen portugiesischen, nach wie vor aber keinen niederländischen Sender empfangen. Ich hatte Sie aber um ein niederländisches Programm gebeten, denn auch wir Niederländer möchten die Nachrichten verfolgen, wenn wir jeden Monat hierher in die Verbannung geschickt werden.

mt: Therefore, I would like to ask you again to ensure that a Dutch channel is also made available.
ref: I would therefore once more ask you to ensure that we get a Dutch channel as well.
src: Deshalb möchte ich Sie nochmals ersuchen, dafür Sorge zu tragen, daß auch ein niederländischer Sender eingespeist wird.

mt: Ms. Plooij-van Gorsel, I can inform you that this item is on the agenda of the Quaestors on Wednesday.
ref: Mrs Plooij-van Gorsel, I can tell you that this matter is on the agenda for the Quaestors' meeting on Wednesday.
src: Frau Plooij-van Gorsel, ich kann Ihnen mitteilen, daß dieser Punkt am Mittwoch auf der Tagesordnung der Quästoren steht.

mt: I hope that a decision will be made there in your favor.
ref: It will, I hope, be examined in a positive light.
src: Ich hoffe, daß dort in Ihrem Sinne entschieden wird.

mt: Madam President, can you tell me why this Parliament does not comply with the occupational safety regulations it has adopted itself?
ref: Madam President, can you tell me why this Parliament does not adhere to the health and safety legislation that it actually passes?
src: Frau Präsidentin, können Sie mir sagen, warum sich dieses Parlament nicht an die Arbeitsschutzregelungen hält, die es selbst verabschiedet hat?

mt: Why has the air quality in this building not been checked even once since our election?
ref: Why has no air quality test been done on this particular building since we were elected?
src: Weshalb wurde die Luftqualität in diesem Gebäude seit unserer Wahl nicht ein einziges Mal überprüft?

mt: Why has the occupational safety committee not met even once since 1998?
ref: Why has there been no Health and Safety Committee meeting since 1998?
src: Weshalb ist der Arbeitsschutzausschuß seit 1998 nicht ein einziges Mal zusammengetreten?

mt: Why has there been no fire drill in either the Brussels or Strasbourg Parliament building?
ref: Why has there been no fire drill, either in the Brussels Parliament buildings or the Strasbourg Parliament buildings?
src: Warum hat weder im Brüsseler noch im Straßburger Parlamentsgebäude eine Brandschutzübung stattgefunden?

mt: Why are there no fire safety instructions?
ref: Why are there no fire instructions?
src: Warum finden keine Brandschutzbelehrungen statt?

mt: Why was nothing done to make the stairs safer after my accident?
ref: Why have the staircases not been improved since my accident?
src: Warum wurde nach meinem Unfall nichts unternommen, um die Treppen sicherer zu machen?

mt: Why is the smoking ban not enforced in the non-smoking areas?
ref: Why are no-smoking areas not enforced?
src: Warum wird in den Nichtraucherzonen das Rauchverbot nicht durchgesetzt?

mt: It is a disgrace that we adopt rules and then do not comply with them ourselves.
ref: It seems absolutely disgraceful that we pass legislation and do not adhere to it ourselves.
src: Es ist eine Schande, daß wir Regeln verabschieden, an die wir uns dann selbst nicht halten.

mt: Ms. Lynne, you are absolutely right, and I will check whether all this is really the case.
ref: Mrs Lynne, you are quite right and I shall check whether this has actually not been done.
src: Frau Lynne, Sie haben völlig recht, und ich werde prüfen, ob all dies wirklich so ist.

mt: I will also submit the question to the Quaestors. I am sure that they attach great importance to ensuring that we ourselves comply with the legal provisions we adopt.
ref: I shall also refer the matter to the College of Quaestors, and I am certain that they will be keen to ensure that we comply with the regulations we ourselves vote on.
src: Ich werde die Frage auch den Quästoren unterbreiten. Ich bin mir sicher, daß diese großen Wert darauf legen, daß wir die Rechtsvorschriften, die wir verabschieden, auch selbst einhalten.

mt: Madam President! Ms. Díez González and I had submitted some questions regarding certain statements made by the Vice-President, Ms. de Palacio, as reported in a Spanish newspaper.
ref: Madam President, Mrs Díez González and I had tabled questions on certain opinions of the Vice-President, Mrs de Palacio, which appeared in a Spanish newspaper.
src: Frau Präsidentin! Frau Díez González und ich hatten einige Anfragen zu bestimmten, in einer spanischen Zeitung wiedergegebenen Stellungnahmen der Vizepräsidentin, Frau de Palacio, gestellt.

mt: The competent services did not include them on the agenda, as they believed they had already been answered in a previous session.
ref: The competent services have not included them in the agenda on the grounds that they had been answered in a previous part-session.
src: Die zuständigen Dienste haben sie nicht in die Tagesordnung aufgenommen, da sie der Meinung waren, sie seien schon in einer vorangegangenen Sitzung beantwortet worden.

mt: I ask that this decision be reconsidered, because that is not the case.
ref: I would ask that they reconsider, since this is not the case.
src: Ich bitte, diese Entscheidung zu überdenken, weil das nicht der Fall ist.

mt: The previously answered questions referred to Ms. de Palacio's conduct in a specific matter, not to the statements published in the daily newspaper ABC on 18 November last year.
ref: The questions answered previously referred to Mrs de Palacio' s intervention, on another occasion, and not to these comments which appeared in the ABC newspaper on 18 November.
src: Die früher beantworteten Anfragen bezogen sich auf das Auftreten von Frau de Palacio in einer bestimmten Angelegenheit, nicht auf die am 18. November des vergangenen Jahres in der Tageszeitung ABC erschienenen Erklärungen.

mt: Dear colleague, we will look into this.
ref: Mr Berenguer Fuster, we shall check all this.
src: Lieber Kollege, wir werden das prüfen.

mt: However, I must tell you that I currently find the situation somewhat confusing.
ref: I admit that, at present, the matter seems to be somewhat confused.
src: Ich muß Ihnen aber sagen, daß ich die Lage im Moment für etwas verworren halte.

mt: But we will examine it very carefully to ensure that everything is in order.
ref: We shall therefore look into it properly to ensure that everything is as it should be.
src: Wir werden das aber sehr genau prüfen, damit alles seine Richtigkeit hat.

mt: Madam President, I would like to know whether Parliament will this week send a clear signal of our dissatisfaction regarding today's decision to reject an extension of the arms embargo against Indonesia, especially since the vast majority in this Parliament has in the past spoken out in favor of the arms embargo against Indonesia.
ref: Madam President, I should like to know if there will be a clear message going out from Parliament this week about our discontent over today's decision refusing to renew the arms embargo on Indonesia, considering that the vast majority in this Parliament have endorsed the arms embargo in Indonesia in the past?
src: Frau Präsidentin, ich wüßte gern, ob das Parlament in dieser Woche ein deutliches Signal unserer Unzufriedenheit bezüglich der heutigen Entscheidung, mit der eine Verlängerung des Waffenembargos gegen Indonesien abgelehnt wird, aussenden wird, zumal sich die große Mehrheit in diesem Parlament in der Vergangenheit für das Waffenembargo gegen Indonesien ausgesprochen hat.

mt: Today's decision against extending the embargo poses a very great danger in view of the situation there.
ref: Today's decision not to renew the embargo is extremely dangerous considering the situation there.
src: Die heutige Entscheidung gegen eine Verlängerung des Embargos birgt angesichts der dortigen Lage eine sehr große Gefahr.

mt: Parliament should, since this is the wish of the vast majority, send an appropriate message.
ref: So Parliament should send a message, since that is the wish of the vast majority.
src: Das Parlament sollte, da dies dem Wunsch der großen Mehrheit entspricht, eine entsprechende Botschaft senden.

mt: The rejection of an extension of the embargo by the EU Member States is irresponsible.
ref: It is irresponsible of EU Member States to refuse to renew the embargo.
src: Die Ablehnung einer Verlängerung des Embargos seitens der EU-Mitgliedstaaten ist unverantwortlich.

mt: As has already been established, the situation in Indonesia is extremely unstable.
ref: As people have said, the situation there is extremely volatile.
src: Wie bereits festgestellt wurde, ist die Lage in Indonesien äußerst instabil.

mt: There is even the danger of a military coup.
ref: There is, in fact, a risk of a military coup in the future.
src: Es besteht sogar die Gefahr eines Militärputsches.

mt: We do not know what will happen.
ref: We do not know what is happening.
src: Wir wissen nicht, was passiert.

mt: So why should arms manufacturers in the EU make profits at the expense of innocent people?
ref: So why should EU arms producers profit at the expense of innocent people?
src: Weshalb also sollten Waffenhersteller in der EU auf Kosten unschuldiger Menschen Profite einstreichen?

mt: This item is not currently scheduled for the urgent debate on Thursday.
ref: In any event, this question is not presently included among the requests for topical and urgent debate on Thursday.
src: Dieser Punkt ist bisher nicht für die Dringlichkeitsdebatte am Donnerstag vorgesehen.

mt: Order of business
ref: Agenda
src: Arbeitsplan

mt: According to the agenda, the next item is the consideration of the final draft agenda, as established by the Conference of Presidents on Thursday, 13 January, in accordance with Rule 110 of the Rules of Procedure.
ref: The next item is the verification of the final version of the draft agenda as drawn up by the Conference of Presidents at its meeting of 13 January pursuant to Rule 110 of the Rules of Procedure.
src: Nach der Tagesordnung folgt die Prüfung des endgültigen Entwurfs der Tagesordnung, wie er nach Artikel 110 der Geschäftsordnung am Donnerstag, dem 13. Januar von der Konferenz der Präsidenten festgelegt wurde.

mt: There are no changes for Monday and Tuesday.
ref: No amendments have been proposed relating to Monday and Tuesday.
src: Zu Montag und Dienstag liegen keine Änderungen vor.

mt: For Wednesday:
ref: Relating to Wednesday:
src: Zum Mittwoch:

mt: The Socialist Group requests that a statement by the Commission on its strategic objectives for the next five years as well as on the administrative reform of the Commission be included on the agenda.
ref: The Group of the Party of European Socialists requests that a Commission statement be included on its strategic objectives for the next five years and on the administrative reform of the Commission.
src: Die Sozialdemokratische Fraktion beantragt, eine Erklärung der Kommission über ihre strategischen Ziele für die nächsten fünf Jahre sowie über die Verwaltungsreform der Kommission in die Tagesordnung aufzunehmen.

mt: I ask the applicant, Mr. Barón Crespo, to justify his request, if he so wishes.
ref: I would like Mr Barón Crespo, who made the request, to speak to propose it. That is, if he so wishes, of course.
src: Ich bitte den Antragsteller, Herrn Barón Crespo, seinen Antrag zu begründen, falls er dies wünscht.

mt: After that, we will proceed as usual: one speaker in favor, one against.
ref: Then we shall follow the usual procedure, hearing one speaker in favour and one against.
src: Danach verfahren wir wie üblich: ein Redner dafür, einer dagegen.

mt: Madam President! The presentation of the Prodi Commission's political program for the entire legislative period was based on a proposal by the Group of the Party of European Socialists, which received the unanimous approval of the Conference of Presidents in September and also the explicit consent of President Prodi, who reaffirmed his commitment in his inaugural speech.
ref: Madam President, the presentation of the Prodi Commission' s political programme for the whole legislature was initially a proposal by the Group of the Party of European Socialists which was unanimously approved by the Conference of Presidents in September and which was also explicitly accepted by President Prodi, who reiterated his commitment in his inaugural speech.
src: Frau Präsidentin! Die Vorstellung des politischen Programms der Kommission Prodi für die gesamte Wahlperiode ging auf einen Vorschlag der Fraktion der Sozialdemokratischen Partei Europas zurück, der die einhellige Billigung der Konferenz der Präsidenten im September und auch die ausdrückliche Zustimmung von Präsident Prodi fand, der seine Zusage in seiner Antrittsrede bekräftigte.

mt: This commitment is significant in that the Commission is a body which, according to the Treaties, has the monopoly of initiative and thus fundamentally shapes the political and legislative activity of this Parliament over the next five years.
ref: This commitment is important because the Commission is a body with a monopoly of initiative in accordance with the Treaties and, therefore, basically dictates this Parliament' s political and legislative activity for the next five years.
src: Diese Zusage ist insofern von Bedeutung, als die Kommission ein Organ ist, das nach den Verträgen das Initiativmonopol besitzt und somit grundlegend die politische und legislative Tätigkeit dieses Parlaments in den nächsten fünf Jahren gestaltet.

mt: I would also like to remind you that this Parliament, in the previous legislative period, expressed its confidence in President Prodi twice; in this legislative period, it again expressed its confidence in him in July, and then, when the new Commission was in office, there was again a vote of confidence for the Commission as a whole in September.
ref: I would also like to point out, Madam President, that this Parliament voted to express its confidence in President Prodi during the previous legislature. It did so again during this legislature, in July, and then, in September, it voted once more to approve the whole Commission.
src: Ich möchte auch daran erinnern, daß dieses Parlament in der vorangegangenen Wahlperiode Präsident Prodi zweimal sein Vertrauen ausgesprochen hat; in dieser Wahlperiode sprach es ihm im Juli erneut sein Vertrauen aus, und dann, als die neue Kommission im Amt war, gab es im September erneut ein Vertrauensvotum für die Kommission insgesamt.

mt: Thus, the Commission has already had sufficient time to draw up its program, and we have had time to get to know it and to explain it to the citizens.
ref: There has therefore been enough time for the Commission to prepare its programme and for us to become familiar with it and explain it to our citizens.
src: Somit hatte die Kommission bereits genügend Zeit, ihr Programm zu erarbeiten, und wir, um es kennenlernen und den Bürgern erklären zu können.

mt: In this sense, I recall the resolution of 15 September, which recommended that the proposal be presented as soon as possible.
ref: To this end, I would like to remind you of the resolution of 15 September, which recommended that the proposal be presented as soon as possible.
src: In diesem Sinne erinnere ich an die Entschließung vom 15. September, in der empfohlen wurde, den Vorschlag in der kürzestmöglichen Frist vorzulegen.

mt: The events of the past week—which began on the sidelines of the Conference of Presidents and in which this Conference was used only to confirm and ratify decisions taken elsewhere—highlight a dilemma: Either the Commission is unable to present this program (in which case it should clarify the situation.
ref: The events of last week - which originated outside the Conference of Presidents, that Conference being used simply to corroborate and ratify decisions taken elsewhere - present us with a dilemma. Either the Commission is not ready to present this programme, in which case it should clarify it.
src: Die Ereignisse der vergangenen Woche - die am Rande der Konferenz der Präsidenten ihren Anfang nahmen und wobei diese Konferenz nur zur Bestätigung und Ratifizierung von außerhalb gefaßten Beschlüssen genutzt wurde - verdeutlichen ein Dilemma: Entweder ist die Kommission nicht in der Lage, dieses Programm vorzulegen (In diesem Fall sollte sie eine Klärung herbeiführen.

mt: According to the words of its President, it is able to do so.
ref: According to its President, it is in a position to do so.
src: Nach den Worten ihres Präsidenten ist sie dazu in der Lage.

mt: Since the Commission is represented by Vice-President Ms. de Palacio, I consider it appropriate, before the vote, to learn the Commission's position regarding its readiness to present the program as agreed.), or Parliament is unable to consider this program, as some apparently claim.
ref: Given that the Commission is represented by Vice-President de Palacio, I believe that, before voting, it would help if the Commission could let us know how ready it is to present this programme, as agreed. Alternatively, Parliament is not ready to examine this programme, as some appear to be suggesting.
src: Da die Kommission durch die Vizepräsidentin, Frau de Palacio, vertreten ist, halte ich es für zweckmäßig, vor der Abstimmung die Position der Kommission hinsichtlich ihrer Bereitschaft zur Vorstellung des Programms, so wie es vereinbart war, zu erfahren.), oder das Parlament ist zur Prüfung dieses Programms nicht in der Lage, wie einige offenbar vorgeben.

mt: In my view, this second hypothesis would amount to a renunciation of our responsibility as Parliament and, moreover, to the introduction of an original thesis, an unknown method, which would consist in providing the groups with the Commission's programmatic speech in written form a week in advance—and not, as agreed, the day before—bearing in mind that the legislative program will be discussed in February, so that we could dispense with the debate, since the press and the Internet would have informed all citizens about it the next day and Parliament would have no reason to deal with the matter.
ref: In my opinion, this second hypothesis would imply the failure of Parliament in its duty as a Parliament, as well as introducing an original thesis, an unknown method which consists of making political groups aware, in writing, of a speech concerning the Commission' s programme a week earlier - and not a day earlier, as had been agreed - bearing in mind that the legislative programme will be discussed in February, so we could forego the debate, since on the next day our citizens will hear about it in the press and on the Internet and Parliament will no longer have to worry about it.
src: Nach meiner Ansicht würde diese zweite Hypothese einem Verzicht auf unsere Verantwortung als Parlament und darüber hinaus dem Aufwerfen einer originellen These, einer unbekannten Methode gleichkommen, die darin bestände, den Fraktionen die programmatische Rede der Kommission in schriftlicher Form eine Woche vorher - und nicht, wie vereinbart, am Tag zuvor - zur Kenntnis zu geben, wobei zu berücksichtigen ist, daß das Legislativprogramm im Februar diskutiert werden wird, so daß wir auf die Aussprache verzichten könnten, da die Presse und das Internet am Tag darauf alle Bürger darüber informiert haben würden und das Parlament keinen Grund mehr hätte, sich mit der Angelegenheit zu befassen.

mt: Since my group believes that a Parliament is there to listen, to discuss, and to reflect, in our view there is no justification for this delay, and we believe that if the Commission is able to do so, we are exactly on time to reinstate the original agreement between Parliament and the Commission and to be able to appear responsibly before our fellow citizens.
ref: My Group believes that since a parliament is meant to listen, debate and reflect, there can be no justification whatsoever for this delay and we believe that, if the Commission is ready to do so, we still have time to re-establish the original agreement between Parliament and the Commission and proceed in a manner which fulfils our duty to our fellow citizens.
